vv35:8.2: Yodhika bandhukanojakā → yothikā bhaṇḍikā nojakā (s2) | yothikābhaṇḍikānojakā (s3)
vv35:9.1: Saḷalalabujabhujaka → ... sujaka (si, s2, s3), saṃyuttā → saññatā (bj)
vv35:11.4: avacāsiḷārapamhe”ti → avacāsulārapakhumeti (bj, pts1-2) | avacāsi āḷārapamukheti (s2, s3)
vv35:15.4: abbhukiriṃ → abbhokiriṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
